thread.title: Kwame Baah-Nyarko turns down offer to work on Samuel Osei Kuffour's team
thread.title_full: Kwame Baah-Nyarko turns down offer to work on Samuel Osei Kuffour's team

title: Kwame Baah-Nyarko turns down offer to work on Samuel Osei Kuffour's team
text:
16:40 CET Kwame Baah-Nyarko turns down offer to work on Samuel Osei Kuffour's team - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
Former management member of Asante Kotoko Kwame Baah-Nyarko has turned down an offer to work on Samuel Osei Kuffour's team. 
The former Ghana and Bayern Munich star is expected to take over the mantle of leadership as president of Asante Kotoko on Friday. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com Sports News Follow Us There must be something seriously wrong when the branch of a tree is bigger than the stem ! By: Adwoa Ayamba
